Grouped_Utterances: Hey! I’ve been pretty good. I actually reached out to a few venues about open mic nights. I got a couple of responses, and I’m thinking about performing next week! I’m a little nervous, but mostly I’m just stoked to share my music. I’ve been writing a lot more. I feel like I’m finding my voice. I’ve been thinking about recording some of my songs and putting them online. I’ve been feeling a bit overwhelmed with everything going on.

I’m trying to write about my experiences and how they shape me. Like, the ups and downs of life. I hope they’ll see that it’s okay to struggle and that they’re not alone in it. Yeah, I want to inspire others through my art. Just balancing music, friends, and everything else. Sometimes it feels like too much. I think I need to learn to say no sometimes. I don’t want to let anyone down, but I can’t do it all. It’s hard for me, but I know I need to try.
I guess I’m just worried about how it’ll be received. True! I just need to push through that fear, I guess.

I think just reminding myself that it’s all about having fun and connecting with people. Yeah, I’ve been doing more breathing exercises. They help a lot. For sure. I’ve also been trying to visualize the performance going well. It feels good. It makes me believe that I can do it.
Maybe I can set aside some time this week to work on recording a demo. Yeah, I’ll do it. I want to make it happen. Yeah, that makes sense. I’ll give it a shot.
